1.text: Write the past participle form of the verbs given in activity 1-2 of the Workbook Unit 8.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Write the past participle form of the verbs given in activity 1-2 of the Workbook Unit 8.</prosody></speak>

3.text: Complete the sentences using passive voice future form. (will + be + past participle)
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Complete the sentences using passive voice future form. (will + be + past participle)</prosody></speak>

4.text: • The school prize giving …………………………. (hold) next week.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The school prize giving will be held next week.</prosody></speak>

5.text: • The parents of the prize winners …………………………… (invite) .
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The parents of the prize winners will be invited.</prosody></speak>

6.text: • The welcome speech …………………………….. (deliver) by the principal.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The welcome speech will be delivered by the principal.</prosody></speak>

7.text: • The prizes …………………………. (distribute) by the Chief Guest.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The prizes will be distributed by the Chief Guest.</prosody></speak>

8.text: • The event …………………………. (cover) by the school media unit.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The event will be covered by the school media unit.</prosody></speak>

10.text: Complete the blanks in future tense passive voice form.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Complete the blanks in future tense passive voice form.</prosody></speak>

11.text: The Indian national cricket team will arrive in Sri Lanka today for a three-week-tour. The players …………………. (welcome) by the President of the Sri Lanka Cricket Board at the Bandaranaike International Airport. During the tour, the two teams will play one test match and three one days. Matches ………………… (hold) in Colombo, Galle and Pallekele. Virat Kohli will captain the Indian team while Sri Lanka ……………… (lead) by Angelo Mathews. Tickets ……………….. (sell) at the Sri Lanka Cricket head office from tomorrow. All the matches …………………. (telecast) live on Rupavahini.
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The Indian national cricket team will arrive in Sri Lanka today for a three-week-tour. The players will be welcomed by the President of the Sri Lanka Cricket Board at the Bandaranaike International Airport. During the tour, the two teams will play one test match and three one days. Matches will be held in Colombo, Galle and Pallekele. Virat Kohli will captain the Indian team while Sri Lanka will be led by Angelo Mathews. Tickets will be sold at the Sri Lanka Cricket head office from tomorrow. All the matches will be telecast live on Rupavahini.</prosody></speak>

14.text: Read the descriptions and match them with the sections of the newspaper.
14.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read the descriptions and match them with the sections of the newspaper.</prosody></speak>
